headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Outpaces Stock Market Gains: What You Should Know
summary: The latest trading day saw Fortinet (FTNT) settling at $86.29, representing a +1.3% change from its previous close.

headline: Does Fortinet Stock Merit a Closer Look After Its 8% Surge in 2025?
summary: Deciding what to do with Fortinet stock? You are not alone. Investors have been eyeing this cybersecurity leader after some energetic moves lately. Just in the past week, Fortinet rose 1.9%, and over the past month it is up an impressive 8.1%. However, even with these recent gains, the stock is still down about 10.1% for the year, making some wonder whether this is a temporary bounce or the start of a bigger trend. Zooming out, Fortinet has been a long-term winner, delivering nearly 10% gains...

headline: BCI Further Solidifies Global Leadership in Cybersecurity with Sixth Fortinet Certified Expert (FCX/NSE8)
summary: RIDGELAND, Miss., October 02, 2025--BCI, a premier provider of cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions and a global leader in Fortinet technologies, proudly announces a landmark achievement that underscores its unwavering commitment to technical excellence and talent development. With Ryan Blue earning his Fortinet Certified Expert (FCX/NSE8) certification, BCI now employs half of all FCX/NSE8-certified professionals in the United States—more than any other Fortinet partner in the world.

headline: Fortinet to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SUNNYVALE, Calif., Oct. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, announced that it will hold a conference call to discuss its third quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, November 5, at 1:30 p.m. Pacific Time (4:30 p.m. Eastern Time). Fortinet's financial results conference call will be broadcast live in listen-only mode on the company’s investor relations website at http://investor.fortinet.c
